title: Red Lobster restaurants in the U.S. and Canada 2013
summary: Overall Number of restaurants has increased over the Year.
Number of restaurants is gradually increasing from 2002 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2005, slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2006, and finally roughly constant from 2006 to 2008.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2003 and 2004.
The highest Number of restaurants, of value 682.0 was reached at Year 2006
Minimum Number of restaurants about 667.0 was reached at Year 2002
min_summary: In general Number of restaurants has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of restaurants is gradually increasing from 2002 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2005, slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2006, and finally roughly constant from 2006 to 2008.
mid_summary: Overall Number of restaurants has increased over the Year.
